LanguageData.CAL_BlackSteel.label: black steel
LanguageData.CAL_BlackSteel.description: Steel alloyed with hepatzion to slightly increase its durability. Can be used for building structures, tools, and weapons.
LanguageData.CAL_Plastin.label: plastin
LanguageData.CAL_Plastin.description: A durable alloy of tin and plasteel useful for weapons. Can also be used for building structures, tools, and sculptures.
